    • Constructor Detail

      • Pawn

        public Pawn(char n,
    int x,
    int y,
    Board board)
        Creates a Pawn with 2 hitpoints and 0 gold.
        Parameters:
        n - The letter that represents the pawn.
        x - Position on the x axis
        y - Position on the y axis
        board - The board on which the pawn is located

      • move

        public String move(Direction d)
            throws OutOfBoardException
        Moves the pawn in a direction.
        Parameters:
        d - The direction to move the pawn to.
        Returns:
        A message that explain what happened during the movement.
        Throws:
        OutOfBoardException - If the pawn tries to move out of the board.

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        To know whether a pawn is dead or not.
        Returns:
        True if the pawn is dead, false otherwise.
